name: Red Eye (PunisherXA)
description:
This is a game made in the last week of the "A Game by its cover" jam.
The cartbridge I used as inspirations is the one in the cover picture: Red Eye

I tried to practice a little with the timeline and practice some artistics new skill I got from a fairy in a tree.How to "play"?

Use W and E to control your altitude.

Use A and D to move the airplane and avoid the mountains.


What is a Red Eye Fligth?

Is a is a flight scheduled to depart at night and arrive the next morning, usually west to east.

Note: This game isn't finished at all
